org.xmlcml.cml.converters.molecule.cml
Class MoleculeEditor

java.lang.Object
  org.xmlcml.cml.converters.molecule.cml.MoleculeEditor
All Implemented Interfaces:
CMLEditor
public class MoleculeEditor
extends java.lang.Object
implements CMLEditor

allows editing of CMLObjects. Supports, bonds, formula, Inchi, etc. Simple example here: 

 usage:
   CMLEditor editor = new CMLEditor();
   editor.setAddHydrogens(true);
   editor.executeCommands(cmlObject);
More examples in Tests

Author:
pm286
